title: DISTURBED Announces The Sickness 25th Anniversary Tour
description: With Three Days Grace, Sevendust, Daughtry, and Nothing More.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 13 hours ago
excerpt: With Three Days Grace, Sevendust, Daughtry, and Nothing More.
text: After a little teasing, Disturbed has announced a 2025 North American tour celebrating their 2000 debut album The Sickness! The tour features Three Days Grace and Sevendust opening the first leg, and then Daughtry and Nothing More opening the second leg. Each night will feature two sets of music, opening with Disturbed playing The Sickness in full, followed by a full set of greatest hits. So if you're into Disturbed, you're gonna love this tour. Tickets are available here. w/ Three Days Grace & Sevendust 2/25 Nampa, ID Ford Idaho Center Arena2/27 Denver, CO Ball Arena3/2 Saint Louis, MO Enterprise Center3/4 Milwaukee, WI Fiserv Forum3/6 Minneapolis, MN Target Center3/8 Chicago, IL United Center3/10 Detroit, MI Little Caesars Arena3/12 Louisville, KY KFC Yum! html:
After a little teasing, Disturbed has announced a 2025 North American tour celebrating their 2000 debut album The Sickness! The tour features Three Days Grace and Sevendust opening the first leg, and then Daughtry and Nothing More opening the second leg.

Each night will feature two sets of music, opening with Disturbed playing The Sickness in full, followed by a full set of greatest hits. So if you're into Disturbed, you're gonna love this tour. Tickets are available here.

w/ Three Days Grace & Sevendust
